entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow in the evening. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
